name: NURSING_NOTES
description: This table contains nursing notes for a given patient contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: NURSING_NOTES
columns.description: The nursing notes for this encounter.  One line of note text is stored per row.
